General.Name: SYoung Group Co Ltd
General.Description: SYoung Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of cosmetic products in China. The company provides facial masks and related products. It offers its products under the Yunifang, Xiaomimu, Dashuidi, Huayaohua, Yu, HPH, and VAA brands. The company was formerly known as Yujiahui Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SYoung Group Co., Ltd. in April 2021. SYoung Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Changsha, China.
